meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cheryl van Middlesworth Michael Folz Ron Trigueiro Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #824.

td.p: Cheryl van Middlesworth, a housewife from Cerritos, California
Michael Folz, a writer from Anaheim, California
Ron Trigueiro, a student from Carruthers, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $49,400)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
AUTOMOBILES
LYRICS
COSMETICS
JESSICAS
CATS & DOGS
